meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or resembling wood.
meanings.sent1: The ligneous table was sturdy and durable.
meanings.sent2: The forest was filled with ligneous trees.
meanings.sent3: The ligneous chair seemed to whisper tales of the forest.
meanings.sent4: Her ligneous voice echoed through the wooden cabin.
meanings.sent5: The ligneous aroma of pine filled the room.

meanings.sent1: The ligneous door creaked as it opened.
meanings.sent2: The artisan crafted a ligneous sculpture from oak.
meanings.sent3: The ligneous boat sailed smoothly on the lake.
meanings.sent4: His ligneous heart warmed at the sight of the wooden toy.
meanings.sent5: The ligneous floorboards creaked under their weight.

meanings.definition: Consisting of or containing wood fibers.
meanings.sent1: The ligneous material was perfect for crafting.
meanings.sent2: The ligneous paper had a natural texture.
meanings.sent3: The ligneous fabric felt rough against her skin.
meanings.sent4: The ligneous pulp was used to make eco-friendly products.
meanings.sent5: The ligneous texture added a rustic charm to the design.
